objects.description: [HexEval Loader](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1249) has exfiltrated victim data using HTTPS POST requests to its C2 servers.(Citation: Socket Contagious Interview NPM April 2025)(Citation: Socket HexEval BeaverTail Contagious Interview June 2025)
